response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it would greatly benefit your endeavors. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, we're extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $12,000. This represents a significant savings compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. We understand the importance of value alignment in transactions, and we're confident that this product will meet and exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 12000}
